abstract: Using a system called geo-fencing, ShopAlerts by AT&T will send text messages to users who enter a defined zone, like an airport.
snippet: Using a system called geo-fencing, ShopAlerts by AT&T will send text messages to users who enter a defined zone, like an airport.
lead_paragraph: On Monday, AT&T will announce the company’s first location-based marketing service through which companies can send text messages to users who choose to receive special offers.

headline.main: AT&T Begins Service to Text Users in Certain Locations
